entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump You Got That Right. Are you sending in the military to help the failing Covid-19 policies of Republican Governor Gary Ducey? Covid-19 infection rate is surpassing New Yorks. No masks anywhere! Those Republican Governors, Florida & Texas sure are failing. What is the plan?
